Package edu.umd.cs.psl.evaluation.statistics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PredictionComparator
    Computes statistics by comparing the truth value of each RandomVariableAtom in the results Database with that of the corresponding ObservedAtom in a baseline.
    PredictionStatistics
    Statistics computed by a PredictionComparator.
    RankingComparator  
    ResultComparator
    Compares GroundAtoms in a results Database with those in a baseline Database.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfusionMatrix
    Confusion matrix data structure.
    ContinuousPredictionComparator  
    DiscretePredictionComparator  
    DiscretePredictionComparatorTest  
    DiscretePredictionStatistics
    Statistics computed by a PredictionComparator which discretizes truth values before comparing them.
    MulticlassPredictionComparator
    Computes statistics for multiclass prediction.
    MulticlassPredictionStatistics  
    SimpleRankingComparator  
    SquareMatrix
    Square matrix data structure.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ContinuousPredictionComparator.Metric  
    DiscretePredictionStatistics.BinaryClass  
    RankingScore
    Methods for scoring a ranking of Atoms against a given ranking.
